N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4244.9 - Affirmative action

State Regulations
ESDC's affirmative action and nondiscrimination policies and
programs are grounded in both public policy and applicable law, including but
not limited to, section
2879
of
the Public Authorities Law, article 15-A of the Executive Law and section
6254(11) of the Unconsolidated Laws. These laws mandate ESDC to take
affirmative action in implementing projects. ESDC has charged affirmative
action department with overall responsibility to ensure that the spirit of
these mandates is incorporated into ESDC's policies and projects. Where
applicable, affirmative action department will work with applicants in
developing an appropriate affirmative action program for business and
employment opportunities generated by ESDC's participation of the
project. Notes
